entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 6:17AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Gusty Winds And Blowing Snow Over Atigun Pass This Weekend... South winds gusting to 35 mph are expected to develop over Atigun Pass today and continue tonight before decreasing slowly on Monday. This will cause blowing and drifting snow with reduced visibility, and could cause travel difficulties over Atigun Pass today through Monday.
